Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram expressed confidence in his team's ability to perform well in the match.
Sri Lanka captain Wanindu Hasaranga highlighted the team's strong bowling attack as a key strength.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the opening game of Group D in the ICC T20 World Cup.
The game is being played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in Long Island, New York.
Others: The teams have prepared extensively in the US, with South Africa focusing on adapting to unknown conditions and Sri Lanka leveraging their early arrival for practice.
